notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: All the authors contributed to the experiments. In particular G.C., M.T.B., C.C. and V.B. prepared the samples and made structural characterization. G.B. and L.A. performed the luminescence study. O.C., L.C., L.M. performed the electrical characterization of the samples. G.B. and V.B. wrote the manuscript.
